Native member field

Mative member fields like location, url, signature, etc... can be handled by creating a channel field with the same name prefixed with "_member" For example member_signature will sync to the signature field. Custom member fields can be handled in the same way. Just create a channel field prefixed with "member_" and the value will also be saved to the profile.
